list_definition.definition: (of) the hard white substance forming the tusks of an elephant, walrus etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Ivory was formerly used to make piano keys

list_ex_of_english: Initially, in temperate climates and for short distances and unpredictable periods, this was achieved by drying vesicle fluid on threads or ivory points or by sealing it between glass plates.
